info.name: Let me fix that for you, Facebook
info.description: Latest version (2020) of Facebook is severely bloated. A few minor changes removes the biggest issues. You want to read the feed, and that's the first thing you should notice.
info.additionalInfo: 2020-08-29 • Displays right column when clicking up an image. 2020-08-28 • Removed the right column. • Removed stories at the top • Removed videochat • Increased the width of the feed a bit.
